title: JSON Schema for hub metadata in plugin definitions.

domain_url.title: The url of the data entity.
domain_url.description: Links to the website represnting the database, api, etc.

keywords.description: An array of keywords that be used in searches.

definition.description: A string that introducing a plugin and defines what it does i.e. 'The plugin_x utility <definition>'

next_steps.description: A markdown string that gets added after the auto generated installation section. Commonly used for next steps following installation/configuration i.e. how to turn on a service or init a system database.

settings_preamble.description: A markdown string that gets added to the beginning of the setting section on the plugin pages. Commonly used for adding notes on advanced settings.

usage.description: A markdown string that gets appended to the bottom of the plugin pages. Commonly used for troubleshooting notes or additional setup instructions.

prereq.description: A markdown string that included at the end of the auto generated `Prerequisites` section on the plugin page. Can be used to include custom prerequisites other than the default set.
